entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Unable to compile .net 6.0 projects in VS 2022 #29713
  • [NetSDKE2E][Regression] With 3.1.424 SDK, building a project with multi referring classlib failed with error MSB1025 on Mac/Linux #28190

Updated

  • `dotnet publish` shows garbled characters when running on PMC on OS with Traditional Chinese language #29151
    Backlog
  • Provide a map file generation to use for remove unused references functionality #10414
    Backlog
  • Dotnet test in multiplatform docker build #29308
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With .Net 8 SDK installed in Chinese OS, the texts should not contain “Core” string when building the project. #29615
  • [NETE2ESDK]With .NET 8 SDK installed, Warning "Workload garbage collection failed with error: An item with the same key has already been added. Key: (Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.android-arm, 6.0.10) displayed when installing andriod workload in CLI. #29082
  • NETCOREAPP2_0_OR_GREATER not defined when net5-windows + UseWindowsForms #29718
  • net7 - Build freezes when publishing trimmed app #29571
  • .Net 7 preview 7 is broken on linux arm64 via QEMU #27190
  • Updating from 7.0.100 to 7.0.101 crashes msbuild on mac #29596
  • Telemetry check causes crash when hidepid=2 is enabled #4270
  • GenerateDepsFile: The process cannot access the file '...\MyProject.deps.json' because it is being used by another process. #2902

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 7.0.103 #29723
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.406 #29722
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.309 #29721
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.114 #29720
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding Microsoft.AspNetCore.EnsureJsonTrimmability host configuration #29719
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fix the floating issue with tests run in VerifySettingFixture..ctor #29717
  • cover template samples with tests + fix floating issue with test run #29716
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Unskip `Publish_HostedApp_WithoutTrimming_Works` #29640
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [release/7.0.2xx] Revert hot reload script injection response buffering #29152
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Create an SDK PR guide #29562
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fix locale-sensitive comparison of UnmatchedArgument error strings #29559
    Servicing-consider, Area-DotNet Test
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2077777 #29624
    Area-Infrastructure
